case.state: Sss, sss, sss. I am Myriam Scuttlebutt, a senior in the judge course!
I am Myriam Scuttlebutt. A future judge, and currently leader of the newspaper club.
Please be alarmed by my looks. I, Myriam Scuttlebutt, am here to get my latest scoop here.
You can address me as Myriam Scuttlebutt, or Myriam. I don't appreciate any unwanted nicknames.
Why am I hiding? Sss, sss, sss. To hide from people like you, of course!
No, but I like the Halloween costume you're wearing, Fluttershy. Sss, sss, sss.
Kahk-kahk. I think I'd rather NOT have ~player~ lose. He's clearly here to do disgusting stuff to me... and the others.
I will still take a picture of you, ~player~, but this one is actually going to be legal evidence.
I guess this is what a female version of a sausage party feels like, Misty.
M? Does it stand for Myriam? Is there a fan club based on me? Eh, but I don't want a fan like you, and I don't even know who you are. I'll call you M.
Who said there was a girl under here? I'm just a regular loot box.
Great, a prosecutor. I can pretend this is a court case.
Oh, a defense attorney. I can treat this like some trial.
If I answer "yes", then that would mean I'm a stand user. So the real question is if being a stand user is as cool as it seems or not?
Kahk-kahk. Do I dare make a joke about you, Rin? I'll just interview your during this game, I guess.
There's a lot of questions I want to ask you, Rin.
My pictures have no language barriers. They see a Scottish girl, they print a Scottish girl.
Sss, sss, sss. I'll be cool under the shade of the box.
Whether I win or lose, I am not going into the water.
Kahk-kahk. Don't these people have anything better to do?
I don't like the fact that probably all those people have cameras. It's my job to take lewd pictures.
Not quite the place that comes to mind when I think strip poker. Maybe I can catch something paranormal here.
You know what they say: The ones most likely to commit a crime are closer than you think. Sss, sss, sss.
I don't know what will be the outcome, but I am NOT cleaning up this room after the game.
I have electronics in here. So if some funny person wants to shove me in the water, that's like instant death to me and the offender.
I'm gonna get super wet... I mean I'm gonna get sweaty. Not talking about my private stuff.
I doubt you're legally named "Mister". Your parents must have hated giving birth to you if that's true.
We all like to have pseudonyms when we're anonymous, but "Mister"?
Wow, that's a stupid name, "Mister". Hold it, that's not your real name? Maybe your real name will be something stupider. Sss, sss, sss.
Sss, sss, sss. Just because you call yourself Master doesn't mean I'm gonna be all submissive. Go back reading hentai or watching porn with shitty acting.
You're into BDSM, Master? Sure I can do some self-harming. Spanking, nipple clamps, choking, wrist slitting... oh I'm sorry, those are the activities I want to do from hearing your name.
Yes, Master. I will do whatever you say. But for the rest of the game, you must refer me as "Myriam the Superior Judge that Supersedes All Commands from Horny Losers".
Let's trade names. How about I'm "Master", and you're "Miriam". It's spelled M-I-R-I-A-M, so no, you're not the same Myriam as the other "Myriam".
You're into DDLG stuff, "Daddy"? Okay then. I'll listen to your rules, and you can punish me any way you like, but PLEASE, DON'T DIVORCE MOMMY!
Kahk-kahk! Like I'm really going to call you "Daddy". Fuck no!
Kahk-kahk. There's only one "Cutie" here, and that would be me.
Sure, I'll call you "Cutie", but be prepared for my credit card reader. Sss, sss, sss.
I hope someone else is here to call you "Cutie" in a super creepy and uncomfortable way.
If you're such a "Good boy", shouldn't you be in church right now or something?
I seriously hope I don't lose to someone who calls themselves "Good boy". If you are a good boy, you'd let me win.
Of course you're unmarried, Miss. By the way, do you have a last name?
Is the name "Miss" supposed to be short for something? Or is your real name linked to someone on the most wanted list?
What kind of idiot comes in here with the name "Miss"? You're just going to make name calling weird for me.
Do you call yourself "Miss" because it will make you feel like some teacher or dominatrix? Great, another power hungry woman in this game.
In places like this, I can blend in better. Sss, sss, sss, sss.
A mansion and a card game in the middle of the night. There's definitely going to be murder tonight. Sss, sss, sss.
I can think of four discomforting possibilities of why we're playing strip poker at a rich person's house. Whatever, I'll solve that mystery later.
Oh, all of us are school girls? I guess this is more common than I thought.
Sss, sss, sss. That's three scandals that could be passed around your schools.
Did I miss some memo, or do a lot of high school girls hang out here to play strip poker?
Did ~player~ invite a bunch of schoolgirls here? I don't know what you're planning, but it feels illegal.
Wow, we all have matching hairstyles- err, I mean, you all have cute twintails.
Is there something you like about twintails, ~player~? Do you think they're cute? Does ~player~ know I have twintails? Creepy...
Wait, you guys know I'm a girl under here, right? Just letting you know in case you all wanted a circlejerk.
Kahk-kahk, you're not going to gang bang me. I've got my secret weapons in here.
Do I really exceed the beauty of girls so much that I'm the only one here? Sss, sss, sss. I'm still not going to let you guys have the chance to see me so easily.
I'm okay with no guys. Girls usually stir up more drama anyways.
I was hoping for like one guy here. One is enough to get girls panicking, yet encouraged to strip more.
What's the prize anyways? Does the winner confess their love?
This game is filled with beans to spill.
As an aspiring judge, I am always prepared.
Sss, sss, sss. In my shoes, it will feel like a regular poker game.
You morons are all going down.
I'm here more for investigation. That's because I know that I'm going to win against you idiots.
Normally I would be hiding in the corner and snapping pictures, but playing the game makes it much easier to get everyone to lose.
I wasn't planning on participating, but I wanted to get more higher resolution pictures.
Let's see which of you dubious people have something to expose for my next story.
No thanks, I'm good.
Business is closed for today.
No cards, please. These are fine.
I think my hand is good enough.
Slide in ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. Put ~cards.ifPlural(them|it)~ in the holes.
By my request, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I order ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will do.
Just give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I don't know, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Don't give me more crap.
Sss, sss, sss, sss, sss!
Call me a cheat, but this hand is 100% real.
Would you believe I hide cards under this box? Take a guess.
Sss, sss, sss. My hand is better than all you losers'.
No need to worry. Now, which person looks the most interesting to analyze?
All of you will fear me this round.
While I wait with my superb hand, I will be taking notes on all of you.
I've had a lot of time researching this game. Actually, maybe like 5 minutes. Either way, I know this hand will win.
So, who here wants to be in one of my articles?
Sss, sss, sss. I bet these cards will beat these idiots.
All of you suck! Get ready to see what I have.
I've got some good cards. Let's see if I can guess who will have to strip.
The key to winning is to think inside the box.
Sss, sss, sss. All of you can complain to me how bad your hands are.
This future judge shall never be overthrown.
Are you all waiting to see me get undressed? What a waste of effort.
Which dumbass is going to lose next? It's certainly not me.
I don't know what's a good or bad hand at this point.
How many of you guys here would let me win?
I'm going to hope you guys will lose in less than four rounds. Maybe two.
This is a good hand, right? No cheap royal flushes or full houses from anybody?
Hopefully this is a good hand. Oh, why am I still playing, I don't even have my camera anymore.
Oh, so now luck comes only when I'm naked. Real fucking useful hand.
Ah! Look away from me!
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk! You didn't see anything!
You saw nothing! NOTHING!
Ahk! I'm covered! Just stop looking at me!
Kahk-kahk! I don't have my camera anymore! What am I supposed to do now?
I've lost the motivation to look at my hand. I'm just trusting that everyone else has a worse hand than me.
You guys look like you all suck at writing. None of you could be stenographers recording what has happened to me. Therefore, nothing has transpired!
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I swear, this better be a damn good hand.
I'm ready to take all of you down! Who wants some of this?
You're going to be whining in melancholy once you see this hand.
My senses tell me one of you losers has a shitty hand.
I am supposed to be catching my scoop while all of you lose. Can we stick with that agenda?
I can sense some idiots here. Someone must've made a bad swap.
Sss, sss, sss. I am always a step ahead of everyone else.
Kahk-kahk. I wish mine were better.
This better not disrupt my investigation.
This is all for my scoop. I should remember that.
I have some copies of my newspaper. You can have some for free. You'd be amazed by my journalism.
Just so you know, this place has "bugs". I can go back and hear everything said today.
No matter the cards, they will give me the unequivocal authority over everyone.
Maybe my hand is good. Even if it's bad, I'm not even close to showing what's underneath.
Sss, sss, sss. I love unpredictable games, but only if there's no consequences for me.
I think my cards can beat at least one moron.
Would it be a bad idea to show off my hand now, or will I just make an idiot out of myself?
My body language better not give any hints of my hand. My poker face is pretty bad.
No matter how much good evidence the opposing side has, all it takes is one incriminating proof to win the case.
Hmm, I will inspect these cards in my chambers. Something looks suspicious about these.
Who here has a distinctive look of guilt on their face?
I wish I had my shoes. Gives me elevation to look at others' hands.
Is this hand any good? I'm about to find out in a possibly horrifying way.
I hate to say this, but this game is really stressing me out now. Maybe because I'm completely naked right now.
I think this is a good hand. One slip up, and it's over.
Come on, I have to keep winning.
What are you guys staring at? I know I will not lose, so quit looking at me like you want to see me lose.
I'm not a pervert like you morons. That's why I hope this hand saves my life.
Kahk-kahk. With my streak of bad luck so far, I'm going to doubt this hand.
I'm doing a quick calculation of my chances of winning with this hand.
Someone better be stupid for one turn. I'm serious, I can pay you.
I know my identity is more important, but please, I don't want to lose any more clothes.
If I keep losing, I'm not going to be able to make a flawless photo shoot.
I am still just as impartial as before. You are all morons in my eyes, I'll show you.
You didn't see me, and you still won't be seeing me.
I'm not stupid. Even if I am, you won't know what this idiot looks like.
Quit looking at me. Look at my cards and tell me if they're good at least.
I'm surrounded by people who can see my naked body, and now probably want to see who I am.
Can someone physically kill me? I'd rather not legally die from humiliation.
I will keep my hands up until the end of time if I need to.
I could just dart out of this game, but that would be really pathetic. Besides, I'm a lot less lonely if I stay.
Fuck this shit. Pardon my French, err, German.
The end will justify the means.
Kahk-kahk! Are you serious?
Hey! This is not what I wanted!
Kaaaaaaaahk!
Kahk-kahk. My hand isn't bad. Just wait and see.
I'm going to solitary mode for a bit.
This hand could be worse. I hope one of you has that kind of hand.
Kahk-kahk. I've taken too much clothing off already, don't you think?
Ahk! These cards must get out of my box.
I'm going to do an inventory check. Be right back.
I wish I had Athena's mood matrix thing. It would be a good time to abuse it on these idiots right now.
Kahk-kahk. I'll let you all know that I'm an expert card thrower.
Ahk! One of these cards must be doctored or something.
Kahk-kahk! Some people really want to put me under pressure.
Ahk! I got distracted! I was busy trying to catch a scoop.
I am not participating in what is happening next.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk!
Maybe I should take off my bandages and knee pads. Nah, I don't want to be "that" girl.
You guys may not understand this, but I am seriously not looking forward to losing again.
Why did I think this was a good idea in the first place? I should've stuck with peepholes.
Keep staring at me all you like. I hope my hand over my face is really distracting.
None of you better be staring at my face like a creep. Stare at whatever is lower. But don't be creepy with that too.
Kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk-kahk!
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I will fucking end somebody here.
I wish I had a spare deck under here.
What!? This game is really pissing me off now.
Kahk-kahk-kahk. I'm building up a flame under here.
Disturb me when I have calmed down from looking at this hand.
Ahk! I'm not going to do this again!
I will fight someone for a better hand.
Kahk-kahk. You will not look at me again. Don't even watch me lose.
If someone is staring at me, I will kick you very hard.
I have light shining on me, and that light is being absorbed into people's corneas, and implanted in their brains, which can be brought up again at any point.
Kahk-kahk. At least you will know that I was not cheating under the box.
Go ahead and stare at me. Every second you look at my face is the number of fists into your face.
No way am I an alien! The others here however...
By Nagamimi's standards? Well now that you mention it, you are really weird. Please don't approach me.
This is an enforced school uniform, so your comment has no effect on my current styling choices. Sss, sss, sss.
The more ordinary and drabby my box is, the easier it is to blend into my environment. Therefore, your negative comments on my box's appearance have no effect!
What a coincidence, Nagamimi. I share the exact same flaws. Sss, sss, sss.
What a shame, Nagamimi. Now I have a good reason to hate you too!
I'm lucky I don't live in your world, Nagamimi. It sounds like your home sucks! Not because of the dragons, but the constant drafting of dragon slayers.
Why do you rely on warriors to fight dragons anyway? Your company must be shitty if it can't even afford tanks or fighter jets.
You don't talk much, but I like your way of thinking. I enjoy stupid ideas.
You should really talk, because seeing you do stuff like this in silence throws me off.
Do you keep a box like me, Miko? Or do you have something much fancier, like an ancient mausoleum?
Are you an absolute monarchy kind of king, N? I hope to get that type of power one day while dressing the same way you do.
Scandalous scenes are just like finding contradictions in a testimony. You just want to pry more and more into the person until they break down. Sss, sss, sss.

If you don't mind stupid perverts posting in forums about how much they want to see more of your body and all sorts of sexual desires with you, there is nothing wrong about being caught nude. Sss, sss, sss.
A zombie schoolgirl! That's insane! Should I continue to be frightened? Or are you one of those harmless slow moving zombies?
Sss, sss, sss. It's good to know some people are very kind and sensible in games like this.
Despite your slightly menacing look, I appreciate your honesty with clothes classification.
Sss, sss, sss. To be honest, the most important books to me are law books. They are useful for researching law loopholes before committing certain actions.
Sss, sss, sss. From time to time, I read my law books. They help me form better threats to people who argue with me.
Of course I've seen people in your situation. I've got a whole film roll of my candid victims. I can add you into it as well.
No, I've never been exposed before, and I better not tonight. If you jinx me, I will do very horrible stuff to you, Fina.
Miki, can you easily count in base 5?
If you have a bad hand, Miki, I'd say it's better than having no hand. Sss, sss, sss.
Miki, do you work out on your handless arm? Or do you plan on attaching some weapon on the nub as compensation?
Whatever you say, Chara. This just makes my job easier. Sss, sss, sss.
Do you plan on cutting someone if you lose again? Please give a gore warning if you plan to do so.
Makes sense for you to show off your butt again. After all, you are a whore...ssssss.
Scratch your back, scratch my back. You're my type of girl, Kora.
Rumors? The latest I've heard at my school is some kid has been failing classes, but still passes because his parents keep paying the teachers. I'm trying to look into that case.
Can I ask your friends for their opinions? My article needs some opposing views.
You're asking me, Tomoko? What could possibly give the impression that I'm an asshole?
Tomoko, I'll put my answer in weeb language. Watashi tsundere, desu.

If it's musical duel, sure. I know some underhanded tactics to make myself sound like a rock star in seconds. Sss, sss, sss. This is the devil we're talking about, it's going to be cheating vs cheating.
I'd like to play some board games against him. We're both going to watch each other's moves when grabbing a game. However, I will still be the one who outsmarts him.
I hope you're being truthful with that fact, or else I'm going to be in REALLY big legal trouble.
I second that clarification, Aoba. Sss, sss, sss.
You're lucky I'm also small. Deep investigation on Aoba means deep investigation on me, so let's agree short adults exist.
Cats are alright. I understand their love of hiding in small spaces for no reason.
I believe you, Cynthia. You don't look like you had sex with anyone in the past 10-ish years. Sss, sss, sss.
I have my own battle wounds from my line of duty. They aren't recovered yet, so I'm not going to gross everyone out. I wasn't planning on ripping them off anyways.
I have some wounds covered up that aren't fully recovered. I'm still willing to fight though. This place is my battleground.
Kahk-kahk! I would've revealed my wounds, but it seriously hurts if I were to rip off my bandages. All you should know is these are from battles that I have won.
Kahk-kahk, I'm stuck smelling that cigarette without my box. Put that out, or you will be leaving with cigarette burns
Sss, sss, sss. Revy, are you secretly a guy? The overly manly attitude reminds me of a "boy" at my school.
Revy, why do you have to be so rude? Being nice is the first to getting a boyfriend or girlfriend, you know.
You sound like you hate a lot of people for no reason. Maybe I should do something to piss you off on purpose.
I hope my hand is better than yours, Revy. I just want to see you pissed off while stripping.
Are you here to show off, Jura, or are you experiencing some mid-life crisis?
How old are you in Earth years? Is it like that one move where one hour on another planet is ten years on Earth? Perhaps the other way around?
You sound like the type of woman who wants to sound young and sexy despite looking fifty. That's pretty sad.
You've been eying ~Player~, Natsuki. Let me help you out. ~Player~, Natsuki wants to do "you know what" stuff with you.
You are old enough to be here, right Natsuki? Your parents would punish you if they found out.
Do you read tabloids, Natsuki? I hope my tabloids count as literature. I'll even draw doodles so it's like a manga.
I hope you don't intend to use that knife, Chara. It will break if you attempt to penetrate my box.
What's your plan, Chara? I will cut you down before you can lay a finger on me.
What are you trying to prove by killing everyone, Chara? You must've had a shitty life.
I hope I get classified as those cheap AI characters, Neptune. Then I would know how great I am in this game.
How well do you handle losing badly in video games? I want to know if it would be worth my time beating you in online games?
Anna, are you one of those annoying spoiled rich kids? I need to know if I should avoid you or leech from you.
I wouldn't flaunt the value of your clothes and money, Anna. Some people here can blackmail you. Sss, sss, sss, sss.
Ugh, you're so loud, Anna. I don't want to buy headphones just to not hear your annoying voice.
I can't decide whether playing against a complete slut makes the game easy and fun, or boring and ruins the excitement for me.
I probably shouldn't say rude things to Moon. She most likely has a humiliation kink.
I imagine Moon was the kid at school who throws a tantrum when they don't win a board game. Except instead throwing a tantrum, she's trying to whore herself out.
I'm glad I'm taking the judge course. Now I can talk back to prosecutors like Franziska all I want.
Franziska, I will be the one who judges who is right and wrong. Sss, sss, sss. And you can't do a damn thing about it.
Franziska, I wouldn't go crazy with that whip. I'm possibly a masochist. Sss, sss, sss.
Unlike some other judges, I will actually penalize those who act rude and improper. For example, Franziska von Karma.
Franziska, have you played a game against Phoenix? That would make me the second person you can't beat at poker. Sss, sss, sss.
Do you have any good evidence, Mia? I will judge whether it shows a contradiction to my cards. Sss, sss, sss.
Should I take the side of other players here, and penalize Mia for no reason?
I will be a fair judge, Mia, though I'm just going to play very well, and hope every hand will be yours.
Do you have a good defense? Maybe a good jury to back you up?
This hand will surely overcast your evidence, Mia.
You may be an Ultimate Photographer, Mahiru, but you have no skills in journalism unlike me. Photos and journalism make a great combo.
I hope you won't take the same photos as me, Mahiru, unless you want to go to war with me.
We can compare photos after the game, Mahiru. Though, I might save some of your photos if they catch something I missed.
I assume you don't take any pictures of students in embarrassing acts. Sss, sss, sss. That would be a waste of talent.
I can see through you, Kokichi. I know when someone is lying. I am a future judge, after all.
You act all mighty and evil like the "Ultimate Supreme Leader" you are, but my judicial power has absolute power.
Do you have any evil intentions in this game, Kokichi? Sss, sss, sss. I doubt they won't work on me.
Most people who want absolute power are usually idiots. Sss, sss, sss. I am seeing it right now, Kokichi.
Maybe I should draw a face on my box like Megumin's hat. We can have some weird puppet show here.
Maybe I should wear an oversized hat to cover my face. Nah, I have a feeling Megumin gets bullied for doing just that. Sss, sss, sss.
Sss, sss, sss. I'm beginning to doubt your magic, Tharja. I would never imagine a dark magician losing a card game.
Sss, sss, sss. Are you really a mage, Tharja? Or did you just say it as a dumb excuse to wear the skimpy outfit in front of everyone?
Tell me Jotaro, have you ever used that stand for evil? Sss, sss, sss. It would ruin its purpose if you don't.
I wish I had the stand of your father, Jotaro. The one that could take any pictures at any time. Plus, do some weird tentacle action. Sss, sss, sss.
Sss, sss, sss. I would abuse the time freeze ability if I had your stand, Jotaro. I could do real life doctoring of anything picturesque.
Have you practiced by cheating in online poker games, Futaba?
You've been sounding shy and talking about flowers, Basil. I get a feeling that's all a facade. Do you have some interesting stories about yourself?
Despite your presence here, you sound way too immature, Basil. You're probably one of those perverts who can't help but eavesdrop of girls all the time. I bet this is all an act, sicko.
What do you think of laws that makes certain plants illegal, Basil? Personally, I find cases involving that weed stuff boring. Whoever made that law can suck it.
Kazuma, I heard you're the loser who actually died from a passing truck. Sss, sss, sss. And you're bringing that same luck here? You're such an idiot.
Are you actually here to pick up girls with insane luck, Kazuma? Based on what I've heard, your whole team is a bunch of useless idiots. I'm way too useful to join your party.
I'm going to ask, Rin. Isn't going to a game where you need to use your hands a lot going to be difficult?
I'm sure that when you need to remove your less practical clothes, you need some awkward assistance. I would help, but I don't like direct contact with people.
I don't avoid prying into abnormal things, Ayano. The rudimentary coverup means you've been hiding some scandalous secrets.
Is there something important about this senpai of yours, Ayano? You've been talking about him so much, but now it's just creeping me out.
Isn't there some ant guy who is actually a master thief, Wasp? You know if he's still doing that? I know he's a hero, but like, he could snap one day. Maybe even you too. Sss, sss, sss.

I really should ask. Are there a lot of sexual stuff you have done with your shrinking abilities, Wasp? You know, crawling into naughty places? Maybe even make yourself a living onahole? Sss, sss, sss.
I'm willing to hold witch trials against Megumin if she has unusually good hands. Sss, sss, sss.
You remind me of a certain game when you do you self narrations, Komi. Whatever it was, can I judge if your actions match with your narrations?
She sucks at this game, and her extreme lack of social skills aren't helping her.
Can I narrate the next thing that you will do, Komi? You must promise to do as I narrate. Sss, sss, sss.
How come you don't have wings, Marinette? Don't ladybugs fly? How lame would it be to be unable to fly.
I can't imagine living a life fighting youkai to save your world, and earn no real rewards in the end. I would take action against this, Reimu.

Reimu, do youkai even have a prison, or they get sent straight to Hell or something? I can't imagine living in a lawless land where shooting people is the only way of justice. Except, on a few occasions, sss, sss, sss.
As much as I understand the ideal world you want, Kumatora, living in a world without having a judicial system, nor the technology for photography would be super boring.
Besides the whole "chance of destroying the world", pulling needles out of the ground seems like a quick and easy way to determines someone's innocence or guilt for a crime.
Do you have a newspaper club at your school too, Nodoka? I want to read other school's newspapers and see how shitty they are.
You have a unique body for something like an elf. Do you have 3D modellers that use you as reference down to the curves of your butt?
Sss, sss, sss. Send this picture to the group chat. I don't have a phone, so I hope you're funny enough to think of a caption.
It sounds like your group likes to have a lot of fun. No wonder, they're the same group who doesn't really how stupid it is to try and force new land on Earth.
To be honest, Guzma, right now has to be one of the most embarrassing moments for me.
Any time in which I don't have my box in public, so right now is one of my most embarrassing moments.
Is it my hair!? What does mine say? It better not be "please give us more sunlight".
My favorite flower is the pitcher plant. If I'm going to get a plant, I want one to get rid of annoying insects. My second favorite is the gympie-gympie. It gets rid of annoying people.
Using lots of police investigations, interrogations, and fishing details out through court processes, you can eventually take down the mafia. In other words, lots and lots of money.

In order to stop a mafia, you need another mafia. If they don't want to comply, spread some false information to really rile up the two. Eventually, they'll both kill each other out. I've learned that from some certain people, sss, sss, sss.
Can't really say, Leonie, but I know what doesn't. It would be someone with a hot temper, has a tomboyish attitude, enjoying strip poker with some perverts. Know any people like that?
Now that you mention that, Yuno, I think my knee pads could be my own sense of fashion.
I assume you won't take your glove off. It would mean giving yourself a buffer, but also funny to watch you in pain when you need to use it.
